name: Transport Tycoon Deluxe
description:
Transport Tycoon Deluxe is a strategy game developed by MicroProse Software and Chris Sawyer. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by MicroProse. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Transport Tycoon Deluxe on PC.
Steve Ramsden produced the game. John Broomhall scored the game.
